segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman drying a plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely focused on her task, polishing with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing dramatically!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing over the front edge of the basin and onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's even forming a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in the water, yet she shows absolutely no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice such a significant event right beneath her nose?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbelievable that she's so oblivious to the mess she's standing in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is steadily pouring, creating a real hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she might slip and fall with all those dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This oversight could lead to a really bad accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the damage starting to spread already.
segments.speaker: PAR
